Public NotInheritable Class SqlTrackingService Inherits TrackingService Implements IProfileNotification

summary.span: 代表使用 SQL 数据库存储跟踪信息的跟踪服务。

span.span: Represents a tracking service that uses a SQL database to store tracking information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类表示一个功能完全的跟踪服务。The class represents a fully functional tracking service. 您可以使用这一现成可用的服务来收集和存储跟踪信息，以及存储跟踪配置文件并在工作流运行时引擎请求时提供这些配置文件。You can use this service out-of-box to collect and store tracking information, and to store tracking profiles and provide them when requested by the workflow runtime engine. SQL 跟踪服务将运行时跟踪基础结构发送给它的跟踪数据写入到 SQL 数据库。The SQL tracking service writes tracking data sent to it by the runtime tracking infrastructure to a SQL database. 在许多情况下，对于 来说，在其数据库和工作流运行时引擎的状态之间保持一致十分重要。In many scenarios it is important for the to maintain consistency between its database and the state of the workflow runtime engine. 因此，`SqlTrackingChannel` 类将使用 接口，以参与到 提供的工作流事务批处理功能中。Therefore, the `SqlTrackingChannel` class makes use of the interface to participate in the workflow transaction batching functionality provided by the . 您可以设置 ，或将适当的参数传递给构造函数，以便将 配置为参与批处理，并将表示挂起的 SQL 数据库更改的对象添加到 。You can set or pass the appropriate parameters to the constructor to configure the to participate in batching and add objects that represent pending changes to the SQL database to the . 还会在其数据库中保留跟踪配置文件。The also maintains tracking profiles in its database. 如果工作流运行时引擎所使用的任何跟踪配置文件发生更改，工作流运行时引擎必须得到通知。The workflow runtime engine must be kept apprised of changes to any of the tracking profiles that it is using. 实现 接口，并定期检查其数据库中的跟踪配置文件，以便将对其数据库中存储的 所做的更改通知工作流运行时引擎。The implements the interface and periodically examines the tracking profiles in its database in order to notify the workflow runtime engine of changes to a stored in its database. 您可以设置 或将适当的参数传递给构造函数以设置间隔， 将按该间隔来检查其跟踪配置文件，以将任何配置文件更改通知跟踪运行时。You can set or pass the appropriate parameter to the constructor in order to set the interval at which the examines its tracking profiles to notify the tracking runtime of any profile changes. > [!NOTE] > 如果在工作流应用程序中同时使用 和 ，建议您对持久性和跟踪使用一个数据库。When using both the and the in a workflow application, it is recommended that you use a single database for both persistence and tracking.

span.span: Using SqlTrackingService
Data Maintenance with SqlTrackingService

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从指定 的应用程序配置文件中初始化工作流运行时引擎时，工作流运行时引擎将调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by the workflow runtime engine when the workflow runtime engine is initialized from an application configuration file that specifies a . 也可以使用此构造函数从宿主应用程序中初始化 。You can also use this constructor to initialize the from a host application. 将依据 中包含的键值对来初始化 。The is initialized according to the key-value pairs that are contained in the . 下表枚举了可能的键、每个值初始化的属性，以及每个属性的类型。The following table enumerates the potential keys, the property which each value initializes, and the type of each property. 与每个键关联的值应该是表示该键所引用属性的相应类型的字符串。The value associated with each key should be a string that represents the appropriate type for the property referred to by that key. 您可以指定以下一个或多个键值对。You can specify one or more of these key-value pairs. |KeyKey|属性类型Property Type|属性说明Property Description| |---------|-------------------|--------------------------| |`"IsTransactional"`|`bool`|指定 是否应使用 参与工作流事务。Specifies whether participates in workflow transactions by using the . 默认值为 `true`，指定将以同步方式将跟踪更改写入数据库。The default is `true`, specifying that tracking changes are written to the database in a synchronous manner.| |`"UseDefaultProfile"`|`bool`|指定在无法为 调用找到跟踪配置文件时，是否将返回默认跟踪配置文件。Specifies whether the default tracking profile will be returned if a tracking profile cannot be found for a call. 默认值为 `true`，它指定将使用的默认跟踪配置文件。The default is `true`, specifying that the default tracking profile will be used.| |`"ProfileChangeCheckInterval"`|`double`|指定检查数据库以查找其跟踪配置文件更改的时间（以毫秒为单位）。Specifies the time in milliseconds at which to examine the database for changes to its tracking profiles. 默认值为 60000 毫秒。The default is 60000 milliseconds.| |`"ConnectionString"`|`string`|指定数据库连接字符串。Specifies the database connection string. 默认为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The default is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |`"PartitionOnCompletion"`|`bool`|指定在工作流实例完成时是否应将工作流实例的跟踪数据转移到数据库中当前活动的分区中。Specifies whether tracking data for a workflow instance should be moved to the currently active partition in the database when the workflow instance is completed.|

exception.span: 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 与 中的 属性值关联的 值不是由 或 表示的。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableRetries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableRetries : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 在执行数据库操作时是否将重试。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the will retry when performing a database operation.

value.span: 如果 应重试操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the should retry the operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `false`，并且 设置为 `true`，则所有事务重试都取决于 属性的值。If the property is set to `false` and is set to `true`, then all transaction retries depend on the value of the property. 如果 设置为 `true`，则将以批处理方式进行某些工作，并且这些工作批处理事务的重试将由 的派生类型（如 或 ）处理。If is set to `true`, then certain work is batched and retries of those work batch transactions are handled by a derived type of , such as or . 不管 是否设置为 `true`，都无法以批处理方式进行以下工作项，并且必须通过 属性处理任何事务重试。Regardless of whether is set to `true`, the following work items cannot be batched and any transaction retries must be handled through the property. - 轮询跟踪配置文件更改。Polling for tracking profile changes. - 当 设置为 `false` 时，所有内容都将写入 SQL Server 数据库。All writes to a SQL Server database when is set to `false`. 除了以编程方式进行设置外，还可以通过配置文件启用此功能。Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file. 有关如何通过配置文件设置此属性的详细信息，请参阅 [工作流配置文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909)。For more information about how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909). 有关重试工作批次事务的一般信息，请参阅 [在工作流中批处理状态信息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d)。For general information about retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

public: property bool IsTransactional { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsTransactional : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否参与工作流事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether participates in workflow transactions.

value.span: 如果 参与工作流事务，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if participates in the workflow transaction; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，跟踪数据将同步写入数据库，也就是说，在跟踪通道上一收到数据就会立即将其写入数据库。Ordinarily tracking data is written to the database synchronously, that is, the data is written as soon as it is received on the Tracking Channel. 如果 为 `true`，则 参与工作流事务。If is `true`, participates in the workflow transaction. 也就是说，它将遵循 定义的语义，并将对其数据库所做的任何更改以工作项的形式添加到 。That is, it follows the semantics defined by and adds any changes to its database as work items to the . 在工作流运行时引擎指示时，服务将提交这些更改。The service commits these changes when instructed to by the workflow runtime engine.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PartitionOnCompletion { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PartitionOnCompletion : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在工作流实例完成时是否应将工作流实例的跟踪数据转移到数据库中当前活动的分区中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether tracking data for a workflow instance should be moved to the currently active partition in the database when the workflow instance is completed.

value.span: 如果应在工作流完成时将跟踪数据转移到当前活动的分区中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if tracking data should be moved to the currently active partition on workflow completion; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您将数据库分区，以便提供存档和删除跟踪记录的有效方法。The allows you to partition the database in order to provide an efficient method for archiving and deleting tracking records. 如果数据库停机时间间隔较长，或者数据库没有计划的停机时间，您可以设置 ，以便在工作流实例完成时将与工作流实例关联的跟踪记录从活动的实例表转移到当前活动的分区中。If your database experiences long periods between down times or your database has no planned downtime, you can set to move tracking records associated with a workflow instance from the active instance tables to the currently active partition when the workflow instance completes. 这样，您将能够存档或删除这些记录，而不必锁定数据库的活动实例表中的数据。This allows you to archive or delete these records without having to lock the data in the active instance tables of the database. 有关分区的详细信息，请参阅 [SqlTrackingService 的数据维护](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/aa349365(v=vs.90))。For more information about partitioning, see [Data Maintenance with SqlTrackingService](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/aa349365(v=vs.90)).

span.span: Data Maintenance with SqlTrackingService

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ProfileChangeCheckInterval { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ProfileChangeCheckInterval : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定间隔的值，应按该间隔检查数据库以查找对其一个或多个跟踪配置文件所做的更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the interval at which the database should be checked for changes to one or more of its tracking profiles.

value.span: 间隔长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The interval length in milliseconds.
The default is 60000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将定期检查数据库，以确定其一个或多个跟踪配置文件是否已更改或已被删除。The periodically examines the database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been changed or have been deleted. 在确定 已被删除时将引发 事件；它在确定配置文件已更改时将引发 事件。When the determines that a has been deleted it raises an event; when it determines that a profile has been changed it raises a event. 运行时跟踪基础结构将同时订阅这两个事件，并在这些事件发生时相应更新其跟踪配置文件缓存。The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to both of these events and updates its tracking profile cache appropriately when they occur. 如果要在跟踪配置文件发生更改时得到通知，您也可以订阅其中任一个事件或同时订阅两个事件。You can also subscribe to either or both of these events if you want to be notified of changes to a tracking profile. 您可以设置 以指定频率， 应按该频率检测此类更改。You can set to specify the frequency with which the should test for such changes. 在为 指定新值时，计时器间隔将立即设置为这个新值。When you specify a new value for , the timer interval is immediately set to this new value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ProfileRemoved As EventHandler(Of ProfileRemovedEventArgs)
Public Event ProfileRemoved As EventHandler(Of ProfileRemovedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 检测到 已被删除时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the detects that a has been deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将定期检查其数据库以确定其一个或多个跟踪配置文件是否已被删除。The periodically examines its database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been deleted. 如果检测到 已被删除，它将引发 事件，并将工作流 放在 中。If it detects that a has been deleted, it raises the event and puts the workflow in the . 运行时跟踪基础结构使用此事件来更新其配置文件缓存。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this event to update its profile cache. 您可以设置 以指定 检查其数据库的频率。You can set to specify the frequency at which the examines its database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ProfileUpdated As EventHandler(Of ProfileUpdatedEventArgs)
Public Event ProfileUpdated As EventHandler(Of ProfileUpdatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 检测到 已更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the detects that a has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将定期检查其数据库以确定其一个或多个跟踪配置文件是否已更改。The periodically examines its database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been changed. 如果在 中检测到此类更改，它将引发 事件，跟踪配置文件包装在 中。If it detects such a change in a , it raises the event with the tracking profile encapsulated in a . 运行时跟踪基础结构使用此事件来更新其配置文件缓存。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this event to update its profile cache. 您可以设置 以指定 检查其数据库的频率。You can set to specify the frequency at which the examines its database.

public: property bool UseDefaultProfile { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseDefaultProfile : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否应为没有跟踪配置文件的工作流类型使用默认 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a default should be used for workflow types that do not have a tracking profile.

value.span: 如果应使用默认跟踪配置文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a default tracking profile should be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true`，当工作流运行时引擎尝试为跟踪服务没有关联 的工作流 获取跟踪配置文件时， 将返回默认的 。If is `true`, the will return a default whenever the workflow runtime engine tries to get a tracking profile for a workflow for which the tracking service has no associated . 现成可用的默认跟踪配置文件与所有活动事件、用户事件以及工作流实例发出的工作流事件相匹配。The out-of-box default tracking profile matches all activity events, user events, and workflow events emitted by a workflow instance. 可以使用 `UpdateDefaultProfile` 存储过程来更改默认跟踪配置文件。You can change the default tracking profile by using the `UpdateDefaultProfile` stored procedure. > [!NOTE] > `UpdateDefaultProfile` 存储过程将更改默认跟踪配置文件。The `UpdateDefaultProfile` stored procedure will change the default tracking profile. 当工作流运行时引擎为跟踪服务没有关联跟踪配置文件的工作流类型请求配置文件时，将会返回这个新的默认配置文件。This new default profile will be returned when the workflow runtime engine requests a profile for a workflow type for which the tracking service has no associated tracking profile. 以前与旧默认配置文件关联的工作流类型将仍然与该配置文件关联，即使在调用 `UpdateDefaultProfile` 之后也是如此。必须对要与新默认配置文件关联的任何工作流类型显式调用 `UpdateTrackingProfile` 存储过程。Workflow types that were previously associated with the old default profile will still be associated with that profile even after `UpdateDefaultProfile` is called; you must explicitly call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` stored procedure on any of these workflow types that you want to associate with the new default profile. 当 为 true 时， 将为其数据库中没有关联跟踪配置文件的任何工作流类型将默认跟踪配置文件返回到工作流运行时引擎。While is true, the will return the default tracking profile to the workflow runtime engine for any workflow type for which it doesn't have a tracking profile associated in its database. 如果稍后将 设置为 false，默认配置文件将仍然与数据库中的这些工作流类型关联。If you later set to false, the default profile will still be associated with these workflow types in the database. 您可以对工作流类型调用 `DeleteTrackingProfile` 存储过程，以便不再将跟踪配置文件与该类型关联，也可以对工作流类型调用 `UpdateTrackingProfile` 存储过程，以便更改与该类型关联的跟踪配置文件。You can call the `DeleteTrackingProfile` stored procedure on a workflow type to no longer associate a tracking profile with that type, or you can call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` stored procedure on a workflow type to change the tracking profile associated with that type. > [!NOTE] > 工作流运行时引擎会将其跟踪配置文件放在缓存中。The workflow runtime engine caches its tracking profiles. 因此，它必须为在其缓存中已有关联跟踪配置文件的任何工作流类型接收 事件，然后才能为该工作流类型的新实例停止使用其缓存的配置文件。Therefore, it must receive a event for any workflow type for which it already has a tracking profile associated in its cache before it will stop using its cached profile for new instances of that workflow type. 同样，工作流运行时引擎必须为此类工作流类型接收 事件，然后才能将新的跟踪配置文件加载到其缓存中，以便与工作流类型的新实例相关联。Likewise, the workflow runtime engine must receive a event for such workflow types before it will load a new tracking profile into its cache to associate with new instances of the workflow type. 在 检查数据库以查找其跟踪配置文件更改时，它将为适用的工作流类型引发相应的事件。The raises the appropriate events for applicable workflow types when it examines the database for changes to its tracking profiles. 执行此操作所依照的频率是由 设置的。The frequency at which the performs this operation is set by . 因此，当您调用 `UpdateTrackingProfile` 或 `DeleteTrackingProfile` 存储过程时，在工作流运行时引擎反映其配置文件缓存中的更改之前，可能会有一段时间延迟（由 指定）。Therefore, whenever you call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` or `DeleteTrackingProfile` stored procedures there may be a delay of up to the period specified by before the workflow runtime engine will reflect your changes in its profile cache. > > 有关跟踪配置文件的详细信息，请参阅 [创建和使用跟踪配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms735943(v=vs.90))。For more information about tracking profiles, see [Creating and Using Tracking Profiles](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms735943(v=vs.90)).

related.span: 创建和使用跟踪配置文件

span.span: Creating and Using Tracking Profiles
